text: Compliment a stranger.
Dance to a random song in public.
Talk in rhyme for 30 sec.
Act like your favorite animal.
Record a calm moment.
Whisper a secret into your phone like it's your best friend.
Say something deep while looking at the sky.
Make a 10-second motivational speech to your future self.
Imitate a movie villain and act out a scene.
Post a 'bad hair day' selfie with confidence.
Draw a doodle of your mood and show it to the camera.
Create a new dance move and name it after yourself.
List 3 things you're grateful for — out loud.
Do a slow-motion walk like you're in a movie.
Roast yourself in 10 seconds. No holding back!
Tell a joke to your camera like you're a stand-up comic.
Record a 'fail moment' story you’ve never shared before.
Sit in silence for 30 seconds — no scrolling, no talking.
Give a random shout-out to someone you admire.
Rap about your day in under 20 seconds.
